GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
Date :  20 .12.2011 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 13 / 2011 
 
Subject :      CATEGORIZATION OF AIRPORTS 
 
 
 
Threat perception at all operational airports in the country has been 
reviewed in consultation with intelligence agencies. In suppersession of previous 
Circular No. 01/2008 dated 18.02.2008  on the above subject, a revised consolidated 
list of Normal, Sensitive and Hypersensitive airports is given below for information 
and necessary action:
